import React, { Component,useContext } from 'react'; import './postdetails.css' import { IconContext } from "react-icons"; import {mainContext} from './../../../context/mainContext'; import { IoMdMenu } from "react-icons/io"; const Postdetails=()=>{ const {postsdetail}=useContext(mainContext); console.log(postsdetail); return(
نام کالا: {postsdetail.title}
ویژگی ها: {postsdetail.explains}
فروشنده: behkala
قیمت: {postsdetail.prices} تومان
) } export default Postdetails;
